name: activity_count
description: Count of activities on the bug.

name: assignee_data_bot
description: True if the given assignee is identified as a bot.

name: assignee_data_multi_org_names
description: List of the assignee organizations from SortingHat profile.

name: assignee_data_org_name
description: Assignee organization name from SortingHat profile.

name: author_bot
description: True if the given author is identified as a bot.

name: author_multi_org_names
description: List of the assignee organizations from SortingHat profile.

name: author_org_name
description: Author organization name from SortingHat profile.

name: date_incomplete
description: Date the bug was marked incomplete.

name: date_last_updated
description: Date the bug was last updated.

name: date_triaged
description: Date the bug was marked Triaged.

name: description_analyzed
description: Description of bug split by terms to allow searching.

name: grimoire_creation_date
description: Message date (when the original author sent the message).

name: is_complete
description: 1 if work on bug is completed, 0 if incomplete or ongoing.

name: latest_patch_uploaded
description: Date the last patch for bug was uploaded.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the item was enriched.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
description: Name of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__gelk_version
description: Version of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Date when the item was stored in RAW index.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated in its original data source.

name: origin
description: Original URL where the room was retrieved from.

name: owner_data_bot
description: True if the given author is identified as a bot.

name: owner_data_org_name
description: Owner organization name from SortingHat profile.

name: owner_data_multi_org_names
description: List of the assignee organizations from SortingHat profile.

name: project_1
description: Project (if more than one level is allowed in project hierarchy)

name: reopened
description: True if the bug was reopened.

name: security_related
description: True if the bug is security related.

name: tags
description: Tags the bug was marked with.

name: time_assigned_to_closed
description: Time difference from bug created to bug closed (in days).

name: time_created_to_assigned
description: Time difference from bug created to bug assigned (in days).

name: time_open_days
description: Time difference from bug created to bug closed for closed bugs, time created to now for open bugs(in days)."

name: time_to_close_days
description: Time difference from bug created to bug closed (in days).

name: time_to_confirm
description: Time difference from bug created to bug confirmed (in days).

name: time_to_first_attention
description: Time difference from bug created to first activity in bug (in days).

name: time_to_fix_commit
description: Time difference from bug created to fix commit for the bug (in days).

name: time_to_last_update_days
description: Time difference from bug last updated to now (in days).

name: time_worked_on
description: Time difference from bug marked in progress to fix committed (in days).

name: time_created_to_last_update_days
description: Time difference from bug creation to the most recent activity.

name: user_joined
description: Date the bug submitter joined the platform.

name: users_affected_count
description: Count of users affected by the bug.
